inn1.comm: starts off with a good length ball on the offstump, he shuffles and works it towards midwicket
adjusts to a fuller length and a firm cover drive is intercepted well at short cover
lovely shot and that's the first boundary of the series, Mortaza pitches it up on the offstump and Masakadza pushes it through the line and beats the bowler
lands it on a good length outside off and gets it to shape away, he shoulders arms
just angles it towards the pads and he forces the single straightaway with a clip towards midwicket
pads up and invites a strong appeal, he gets it to cut back in sharply and offers no stroke, perhaps it was hitting him outside the line, Doctrove shakes his head
holds the length back and the ball goes through straight to the keeper
Mahbubul bowls his first ball in ODIs, lands it bang on target outside off and he defends forward
lands it on a good length outside off and gets it to shape away slightly he lets it go
strays on the pads, he shuffles and works it away down towards fine leg
that's a cracker of a shot, it lands on a half volley outside off and he takes a step forward and bangs it past the bowler's outstretched hands and the ball screeches past mid-off
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends
shoulders arms outside off
opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man
lands it on a length outside off and he shoulders arms
shuffles across his stumps and works it down to midwicket
angles it towards the pads, he shuffles and works it wide of square leg
angles it outside off, he he angles it down towards backward point
he gets a big shuffle across his stumps and the ball moves away very late and very nearly takes the outside edge
bangs it in short outside off and he ducks under that bouncer
edged and no second slip, he squares him up nicely on off and middle and he shapes to work it to the on side but gets a leading edge which ballons past first slip, Ashraful should attack more
flighted on the offstump, he gets behind the line and defends to the off side
works it towards mid-on for a quick single and the underarm flick just misses the stumps

Mortaza bangs it in on a good length on the offstump and gets it to cut back in, he tries to defend close to his pads but he appears to get a thick inside edge on to his pad which lobs up to Shakib at square leg who runs forward, the appeal was initially for a lbw but he was given out caught, I need to see another replay of that
shapes away outside off, it just beats the edge
shuffles across his stumps and works it with the swing past mid-on, he doesn't go through with the shot well but places it well enough
gets well forward to a delivery which angles away and it's defended
gets forward and covers the away movement by defending
not the best of shots, the ball angles towards the pads and he chips it away to the on side and just about bisects the gap between mid-on and midwicket, it was in the air for a few anxious moments
lands it outside off, he shoulders arms

and again no second slip! He lands it outside off and the ball just moves away off the seam, he reaches out to cut it past backward point, gets his elbows high and gets a thick outside edge past first slip and fourth slip
angles it towards the pads and he works it to the on side
tries to punch it back past the bowler but he mistimes the shot down the pitch
adjusts to a fuller length and he gets forward and steers it to the offside
shuffles across a touch and turns the face of the bat to work it away down to midwicket but he mistimes it
angles it on the pads and he clips kit off his hips towards fine leg
probes away outside off and teases the batsman onto the forward prod
lands it outside off and he shoulders arms
gets across his stumps and pats it away towards cover
lands it on the off stump and he plays it to the off side
angles it on the pads and he works it to the on side
short and wide and he shapes to slash it down to point but he mistimes the shot and chops it down to the fielder
wide outside off, he reaches out and cuts to third man
slightly short of a length and he angles it down to third man
closes the face of the bat and softly nudges it in front of mid-on and sets off quickly for the run, good calling
holds the length back on the offstump, he gets behind the line and defends
adjusts to a fuller length on the offstump and he defends forward
good shot, he strays on the pads and pitches it up, he gets forward and chips it high in the air over midwicket, stylishly put away
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends
bowls it dead straight on the offstump and he defends it away back to the bowler
adjusts to a fuller length on the off stump, he defends
gets across his stumps and defends softly to the off side
he shapes to pull it away too early but the slower ball foxes him and the ball hits his body instead
Sibanda nearly cleans up the non-striker, he gets forward to a full delivery and whacks it through the line and Matsikenyeri spreads his legs out to evade the ball as it screeches past him
opens the face of the bat and angles it down towards point
gets behind the line and steers it to the off side
gets his bat nicely behind the line and softly taps it just wide of mid-off for a single
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends
flighted outside off and defends
gets forward and smothers the spin

floated from outside off, the ball lands in line with the middle stump and goes through with the angle, Sibanda defends very close to the pads, Shakib persists with the appeal and the umpire Nadir Shah raises the finger
this is the first time I'm seeing a new batsman start off with the reverse sweep! The ball drifts outside leg, he fetches it and beats the diving backward point fielder
the reverse sweep again, this time he finds short third man
and another reverse sweep! He gets in position early and plays it down to third man, this is imperious stuff and he obviously wants to throw Shakib off target straight away
gives him width outside off to free his arms outside off and he opens out and cracks the ball in the gap between mid-off and extra cover, he bends his knee and hits it off the meat of the bat
flighted on the offstump, he gets forward and defends
defends to the off side
there;s a misfield at extrav cover and they take a second run
flighted on middle and off, he lunges forward and defends
floated on the pads, he works it to the on side
loud appeal! It comes back in off a good length and hits his back bad as he tries to work it away to the on side, it was a good shout though but maybe missing leg
this one comes back in and hits him outside the line of the leg stump and the ball rebounds to the off side
strays down the legside and he misses it as he tries to flick it away
gives him some width outside off, he gets his elbows high and punches it wide of cover
gets behind the line and defends
tucks it to the on side
flighted outside off, he defends to the off side
floated on the pads and he gets on his knee and sweeps
takes it on the full and he sweeps to deep square-leg
gets forward and defends
slightly wide outside off and he chops it to the off side
gets on his knee and sweeps it behind square
nearly slices him in half but he gets behind the line and defends down the track
gets forward and defends
taps it towards mid-on with soft hands and he sets off for a quick single, risky run in the end
walks across his stumps and taps it to the off side
stand and deliver! He pitches it up on the offstump and he scoops it across the line and clears mid-on comfortably
this one kicks up off a good length outside off, he gets his elbows high and steers it to third man
makes room and cuts to the off side

that reverse sweep was bound to out him in his place at some point, he tries to cream  a  high full toss over the off side, Mortaza at short third man leaps up, fumbles initially but takes the catch at the second attempt
gets well forward and defends
thrusts his pad forward and defends to the covers
slides down the leg side, wide called
slides down the legside, he shuffles and the ball hits his pads and rolls away
hits a good length outside off, he makes room and cuts to cover
exposes his stumps and tries to paddle it away but he fails to pull it off
gets forward and works it back to the bowler
tucks it to the on side another maiden
shuffles and works it with the to the on side
works i to the on side
lovely delivery, he gets forward and the turn just beats the outside edge

that's a stunning catch! He gets forward to chip it with the turn towards mid-on, Raqibul at short midwicket flings himself to his left and pulls off a stunner while airborne, he will cherish this catch for a long time

now Zimbabwe are in deep trouble, he gets it to turn sharply from over the wicket, Williams tries to work it to the on side but the ball hits his pads in line with the leg stump, he gets only half forward
gets forward and defends
gets well forward and defends
flighted outside off, he defends again
gives it air outside off, he gets well forward and defends
flighted outside off, he defends
gets forward and punches it to long-on
gets sharp turn and it drifts don the leg side
gets behind the line and punches it to the off side
flighted outside off, he lunges forward to defend
keeps it tight, flights it on the offstump and he defends
gets forward and works it with the turn to the on side
gets forward and works it towards square leg
lobs off his pads and a short leg, had he been there would have gobbled it up
nice shot, he pitches it short of a length, he rocks back at his crease and spanks it wide of cover and extra cover
thrusts his pad forward and defends
gets well forward and defends
keeps low and really skids it through, he just manages to cover the line and hit it back to the bowler
makes room and cuts a good length ball down to sweeper cover
gets behind the line and defends
shuffles and works it against the turn wide of midwicket
gets beside the line and defends it back
gets well forward and defends
flighted on the off stump, he defends
gets it to turn back in sharply, he defends
turns in sharpy again, he defends
shuffles and clips it with the turn to the on side
gets forward and defends to the off side
opens the face of the bat and steers it to the off side
gets well forward and pushes it to sweeper cover
gets a few paces forward and works it to the offside
gets well forward and clips it to the on side
opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
gets on the backfoot and punches it back to the bowler
comes round the wicket, he makes room and pushes it back to the bowler
drifts it on the pads, he works it back to the bowler
shoulders arms and gauges the turn and bounce
stays at the crease, he waits for it to skid through before punching to the off side
nudges it to the on side off his pads
gets well forward and punches it to the off side
stays back at the crease and defends with soft hands
opens the face of the bat and delicately glides it to third man
gets forward and defends
angles it on the pads, he gets on his knee to slog sweep it but he keeps it along the turf and places it to deep square leg
gets well forward and defends
gets forward and works it to sweeper cover, he pushes the second run and they scamper home
gets forward to drive but he's beaten for turn and pace
thrusts forward and beats the bowler
gets forward to a full ball and defends
gets behind the line and pushes it with the turn to the off side
very soft dismissal, it's a long hop which should have been put away, he stays back at the crease and tamely punches it back to the bowler, he takes a very easy return catch
stays back at the crease and waits for it to turn before defending
gets forward to a full ball and defends
keeps to the same full length but adjusts the line to outside off, he pushes it through the line to the covers
shuffles and waits for the turn before working it to the on side
stays on the back foot and punches it hard but he finds short cover
lands it on a good length and the angle it straight, no movement off the pitch or in the air, he defends
sticks to the same line, he opens the face of the bat and glides it wide of point
full outside off and he times the drive well but can't beat the diving short extrav cover fielder
punches it towards mid-off and Utseya sends Chigumbura back, he makes it back to his crease just after the direct hit
gets forward to a full ball and drives to cover
slower ball outside off and he shoulders arms
chips down the track straight after the drinks break and lofts it towards long-on
stays back at the crease and punches it to the off side
shuffles and clips it with the turn to the on side
super shot, he errs by dropping it a little short outside off, the lack of pace allows him to rock back and punch it wide of cover, the sweeper cover fielder gives up the chase
lunges forward and smothers the spin
tucks it to short fine-leg and takes a quick single, Junaid's throw hits the stumps  but the batsman  is safe, the third umpire takes a look
well played, he opens the face of the bat and steers it wide of point for a quick single
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends down the pitch
tucks it through the line towards mid-on and sets off for a well-judged single
clips a slower ball uppishly towards Junaid at short midwicket and he nearly takes the catch on the full, the fielding has been good today
gets forward to a full delivery and just beats short cover
bangs in the bouncer and it's close to being called a wide down the legside
turns just a  bit and he gets his pad across and defends
punches it through the line to mid-on
tosses it outside off, he defends forward
angles it on the pads, he lunges forward and tucks it to the on side
stays on the backfoot and punches it with the line wide of mid-off
gives it more air outside off, he gets well forward and steers it to the off side
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
pushes it to the off side
tries to force it past the bowler nut he mistimes the shot
angles it towards the pads, he shuffles and gets a faint touch to the ball and it's just enough to beat Mahbubul who dives in vain at fine leg
gets forward and steers it to the off side
gets well forward and defends to the bowler
thrusts his pad forward and tucks it to the on side
gets forward and drives to short cover
gets to the pitch of the ball and defends to the off side
gets forward and clips it to the on side
gets down a little too early to sweep and he fails to make contact
full toss, he taps it to the on side
pushed to the on side
gets a few paces forward and the ball hits his pads
gets forward and he can't pierce the infield
full and gets it to swing in late, he gets forward and taps it back to the bowler
swings it on the pads, he shuffles and clips it in the air past the vacant midwicket region
drifts on the pads, he clips it behind square on the on side
keeps it full and gets it to swing in and Utseya fails to pierce the infield on the off side
slides wide down the leg side and wide called
goes for a big heave across the line but he mistimes the shot and places wide of long-on
tries to smash that over deep square-leg but he fails to pick the slower ball and swishes at thin air instead
short of a length on the off stump, he punches it wide of the bowler
the sharp turn beats the outside edge
gives it a lot of air on middle and off and tempts Utseya into going for the slog sweep, he gets a thick top edge and it sails straight in to Mahbubul's hands at deep square-leg
punches it to the off side but fails to beat short cover
settles for a forward defense this time
full outside off, he drives to the off side
bowls it full and swings it in on his pads, he moves across and digs it out to the on side
bang! He grants him width outside off, he bends his knee just a touch, gets his elbows high and flays a square drive past backward point and cover
angles it on the pads and he works it away through the line to midwicket
gets some late reverse swing on the pads and nearly traps Price all ends up as the ball clips his pads and nearly hits the offstump, there's an appeal but the ball was missing leg
bowls a full toss down the leg side and Price really should have got some bat on that
punches a full delivery past the bowler and down to long-on
tries to drives through the off side but the ball travels off the toe edge of the bat to sweeper cover
it's a low full toss on the pads and he misses out on fetching a boundary as he only succeeds in placing it to midwicket
another full toss angling down the legside and this time he's fortunate to find the boundary thanks to  a misfield by Mahbubul at short fine-leg
opens the face of the bat and steers it towards cover
digs out an inswinging yorker to short fine leg and Mahbubul's throw is just wide of the stumps at the striker's end
nice shot, he overpitches on the pads and he stays at the crease and whips him on the up down to the vacant fine leg region
the square drive is placed with power towards backward point and a neat dive saves at least a couple of runs
full on middle and leg and he works it to long-on
gets a half stride forward and taps a slower ball towards short extra cover and sets off quickly
tucks a yorker length ball towards mid-on and Chigumbura is sent back and dives at his crease
clips it towards midwicket and sets off for a quick single, he's miles out of his ground and the throw is well wide of the stumps, there are over thows as well
makes room and heaves a full delivery across the line to the on side
pushes it to the on side
pushes a low full toss down the ground to long-on and gets to a very well-deserved half-century under pressure
makes room to heave him over mid-on but fails to pick the slower ball, the ball nearly shaves the legstump
fails to pick another slower ball but the ball rolls off his pads to the off side and they steal a leg bye, Mortaza underarms the ball on to the stumps but the batsman is home
slams a low full toss down the ground to long-on

easy take, Mortaza continues bowling the slow off cutters and this time he pitches it up, Price makes room and tries to cart him over long-on but he fails to get enough elevation and finds Shakib who takes it easily just before the rope
misdirects a slower ball down the legside, Rahim dives in vain to his left to cut it off
just opens the face of the bat and angles a slower delivery towards point
makes room to smash it over his head but he hits it off the splice of the bat and falls well short of long-on
the first of the series, he stays at the crease, waits for the slower ball to come on to him and slams it straight over the bowler's head
pitches it full and gets it to curve in, he makes room and clubs it over midwicket, he bisects the fielders in the deep
makes room and heaves it over square leg, they attempt a second run but the throw from the deep is sharp and Rahim does well to slide to his right and whip off the bails
goes for a heave but the ball hits his pads and trickles to the off side

inn2.comm: lands it outside off and he gets good carry through to the keeper
loses his radar and slides it wide outside the off stump, he doesn't offer a stroke
short and wide and out away, there's movement off the pitch and he reaches out and slams it alng the turn past backward point
he gets movement in to the left-hander  but it drifts on his pads and all Tamim has to do is to get a faint glance to fine leg, the fielder dives in despais
lands it outside the off stump and he shoulders arms
plays it very late and as he clips it close to his pads down to midwicket
gives it a lot of air, he drives it to mid-on

not so sure if that was hitting the stumps, he delivers from round the wickets and gets the ball to drift away from the left-hander, Junaid gets forward and is hit on the pad but it didn't really look like hitting the offstump, no wonder Junaid was a little surprised at Doctrove's decison
gives it a lot of air  and he forces it back to the bowler
takes a couple of paces down the track and defends it away
tries to ease it past the bowler but Utseya does well to slide and intercept it to his right
flighted outside off, he gets well forward and defends
continues over the wicket, lands it on a full length and he steers it to the off side
tries to force a full delivery down the ground but he gets an inside edge which rolls to fine leg

Mushfiqur completely misjudges it! Rainsford lands it on a good length on the offstump and gets it to come back in, Mushfiqur shoulders arms and expects the ball to sail over the stumps but to his horror it clips the top of the offstump, excellent delivery to square him up and it's game on already at Mirpur
drives a full delivery back to the bowler and there's a spring in Rainsford's step as he rolls the ball towards the stumps and just misses
gets it to come back in and the batsman defends very close to the pads
tries to clip it to the on side and nearly pops a leading edge back to the bowler
gets forward and works it to the on side
there's no turn as he shoulders arms
gets forward and defends with a straight bat
gets forward and defends with an angled bat
defends forward and the ball rolls to the off side
gets forward and pushes it towards short extra cover
strays on the pads and it's too full, he shuffles and nudges it down to fine leg
holds the length back on the offstump and he stays back and defends to the off side
adjusts to a fuller length and wider of the offstump, he gets forward and shoulders arms
the slower ball, it's aimed at the offstump and he closes the face of the bat and taps it to the on side
cranks up the pace, directs it just wide of the offstump and he pushes it firmly down the pitch
thrusts his pad across and safely shoulders arms to a delivery which moves away
flighted outside off, he defends forward
full and wide outside off and Ashraful drives firmly past point, Williams gives the chase and slides and drags the ball back but unfortunately it dribbles back towards the rope
gets forward and defends
flighted on middle, he defends
stays back and clips it softly towards short leg
pushes this one quicker, he gets forward and taps it away
lands it on a good length on the offstump, he gets nicely behind the line and defends
full and angling in towards the stumps, he closes the face of the bat and pushes it down to mid-on
stays at the crease and gets just a hint of width to punch it past covers but he places it straight to short cover
reaches out to drive an away swinger but gets an outside edge to third man
Ashraful nearly gives it away, the ball is angled in the pads and ashraful fails to pick the slower one, he checks the chipped drive and the ball just lands short of short midwicket
much better, gets behind the line and defends forward
makes room to cut but chops it to the off side
gets forward and defends
gets beside the line and defends forward
the ball skids through and he nearly gets a thick edge to the keeper
gets forward and defends
places it towards cover and it's another maide, the captain's setting a fine example here
he takes a few paces forward to force it through the on side but he chips it on the up towards mid-on and sets off for a quick single
gets behind the line and defends
chases a wide delivery and the ball travels off the thick edge and travels to third man
forces a full delivery through the off side but he doesn't time it well  but places it well enough to beat mid-off and cover
lands it on a good length outside off and he gets beside the line and taps it to the off side
pushes it down the pitch but can't beat mid-on
pushes it quicker, he gets beside the line and defends
skids it on the middle stump, he gets behind it and defends
commits to the front foot and defends
pitches outside off and heads towards the pads but it appeared as if he got an inside edge, loud appeal and Doctrove shakes his head
gets forward and defends
tucks it in front of mid-on and sets off, he just makes his ground
Chance Gives him the charge and he nearly scoops it on the full to mid-off, the ball  just dips on Matsikenyeri as he gets forward, he slides to his right when he should have gone forward
clips it away to the on side
lovely shot, the half volley angles away from him, he gets forward and drives it firmly past the arc between cover and short extra cover
strays towards the legstump, he shuffles across early and whips him down to fine leg, the fielder was a little too square to cut it off
full outside off and he flays at it but gets a thick outside edge to third man
gets forward and defends down the pitch on the walk

terrible mixup and Tamim can't believe what has happened, ashraful gives the charge and scoops it just over short midwicket, the throw from long-on is fired to the keeper, Ashraful isn't interested in the extra run but fails to notice that Tamim's already half way down the pitch, Tamim has no time to turn around and he gives up thanks to the accuracy of the throw
gets well forward and defends

now Ashraful goes and Bangladesh are in deep trouble, Ashraful gives him the charge and tries to clear long-on but fails to get the desired elevation, the ball dips on Sibanda and he manages to hang on to it very well on the dive
gets forward to a full ball and works it down to long-on to get off the mark
gets behind the line and punches it back to the bowler
stays back at the crease and slices it to backward point
starts off with a slower one, he closes the face of the bat and works it back to the bowler
gets across to a good length ball and defends
slides too wide down the leg side and he's penalised
moves across his stumps and glides a full delivery past the slips and down to third man
full outside off and nicely played, he gets beside the line and caresses it between cover and extra cover
angles it on the pads and Shakib gets his timing spot on as he whips it away past square leg, the fielder in the deep gives up the chase thanks to the quick outfield
reaches out and scoops it just wide of backward point, Bangladesh could have lost another one
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
pushes it back to the bowler
punches it through the line to long-off
angles it towards middle and off, he defends
gives it a lot of air outside off and he takes a few paces forward and pushes it gently past mid-off and cover, the placement is spot on
full outside off and pushed to mid-off
gets a big stride forward and tries to force it through the gap but finds mid-off
stays back at the crease and punches it past the bowler but can't beat mid-off again
swing and a miss and he nearly loses his offstump, the ball deflects off taibu's pads and rolls to the off side
that's a text book off drive, he shows the full face of the bat and punches it elegantly off the front foot and beats the arc between mid-off and extra cover, the follow through is also good
strays on the pads and he nudges it behind square on the on side
stays back at the crease and punches it down to long-on
flighted on the offstump, he gets well forward and defends
full outside off and defended
full on middle and he drives down the pitch
full outside off and driven towards long-off
gives it a lot of air, he pushes it through the line to long-on
continues over the wicket, he lands it on the pads and he taps it back to the bowler
bowls a nagging line and Shakib's punch beats the bowler but not mid-off
doesn't get  room to free his arms as he clips it to short midwicket
another straight delivery is punched through the line to mid-off, this is restrictive stuff
chips it on the up just wide of the bowler but can't get a run
just strays on the pads and he clips it away down to deep square-leg
strays on the pads, he works it towards square leg
stays back at the crease and punches it to deep cover
pushes it quicker and he works it back to the bowler
slides to his right and intercepts a punched drive, the ball rebounds to short cover
gets forward and pushes it to long-on
gets well forward and defends
stays back at hs crease and pushes it in front of mid-on and sets off
lands it on a fullish length outside off, he opens the face of the bat and edges to third man
full on the pads and worked back to the bowler
full on the pads and worked back to the bowler
not quite short enough  to pull but he goes through with shot and finds deep square-leg
drags it from middle and off with a flick of the wrists and nudges it to fine leg
pushed back to the bowler
dives to his left and intercepts an off drive
gets forward and defends to the on side
tries to force it past the bowler
gives it a bit more air and he gets to the pitch of the ball and works it to long-off
uses his feet and works it with the turn to long-on
taps it with soft hands in front of mid-on but Raqibulm decides against the run
Shakib breaks the shackles, the ball sits up nicely for him to go through with the loft and he comfortably clears mid-on
gets a half stride forward and punches it towards long-on
full outside off and driven straight to short extra cover
play another one of his textbook cover drives but there's protection in deep (Price)
reaches out to drive late and gets a thick outside edge to third man
gets behind the line to a full ball and works it towards mid-on
rocks back at his crease and cuts to deep point
full outside off and driven towards mid-off
full outside off and driven towards long-on
full on the pads and pushed down the ground
defended back to the bowler
takes a few paces down the pitch but checks his stroke and places it to long-off
tucks it towards midwicket and takes a quick single
reaches out to drive and takes a single to mid-on and that brings up a very valuable 50 stand
stays at his crease and defends
pushes it quicker and he defends
slower through the air, he stays at the crease and defends with soft hands
full on the pads and pushed down the pitch
flighted on the pads and he defends back to the bowler
gives the charge but fails to beat the bowler
tries to slog it away  but he gets a top edge which travels to fine leg, the fielder does well to watch the spin as the ball lands
chips it on the up past the bowler and they take a single to long-on
this time Shakib chips it past the bowler for a single to long-on
stays at the crease, waits for the turn and works it down to long-off
stays at the crease and cuts to extra cover
takes a few paces down the pitch but checks his stroke and works it down to long-off
punches it past the bowler and it's another very easy single to long-off, these two are frustrating the visitors
makes room and cuts wide of point
works it to the on side
takes the risk of exposing his stumps and he cuts it away wide of point
golden opportunity to break the stand, he taps it in front of the bowler and sets off for a risky run, he's sent back Taibu's throw misses the stumps and he was gone by a few yards
that run-out miss didn't cost anything at all! He slips in a quicker one and Raqibul's beaten in flight as he gets forward to drive and the ball goes through straight and hits the stumps
worked to the on side
makes room, waits for it to turn from the rough and cuts wide of backward point
shuffles and works it away to the on side
gets forward and clips it to short midwicket
Zimbabwe are clawing back and hard! Price teases him with flight and he gives him the charge and attempts to take him down town, he misses the ball completely and Taibu has the easiest of stumpings
works it to the off side
flighted on the pads, he works it to midwicket
flighted on the pads, he defends to the on side
lunges forward and defends
gets a few paces down the pitch and works it to long-off
flighted on the pads, he gets forward and defends
gives it a lot of air, he defends on the front foot
gets forward and smothers the spin
this one straightens and beats the outside edge
worked to the on side
plays the paddle scoop over the wicketkeeper and Williams shows amazing commitment to slide and cut it off inches before the rope at fine leg
flighted on the pads, he gets on his knee and sweeps past square leg
flights it on the pads, he gets forward and pushes it to long-on
taps it in front of cover with soft hands and charges off for the run
fetches it from wide of the offstump and gets a top edge off the slog sweep to deep square-leg
pushes it to sweeper cover
gets forward and works it back to the bowler
slides it down the leg side and wide called
gets forward and works it back to the bowler
forces it down the pitch but he can't beat the bowler again
flighted outside off, he gets forward and steers it to the off side
defends, that ends another tight over
flighted on the offstump, he forces it through the line to long-off
gives it a lot of air, he takes the cautious route by defending
taps it towards cover point and yells at his partner to stay back
nudges it towards short fine-leg and sends his partner back
Price stops at the crease before delivery to unsettle Islam, he gets on his knee and sweeps uppishly past square leg
gets forward and steers it to the off side
makes room to cut but finds short third man
he fails to put away a low full toss and finds cover
full outside off and driven to sweeper cover
takes a few paces down the pitch and works it to long-off
sweeps from outside off and he places it wide of short fine-leg and sets off quickly
gets a half stride forward and defends
gets forward and defends down the track
takes a pace forward and defends on seeing the turn
slower through the air, he gets well forward and defends
pushes it to the off side
nice counterattacking shot from Islam, he gets a delivery which comes on flat and he gets a strong bottom hand on the slog sweep and nearly clears the deep midwicket rope
slower through the air, he defends
the ball keeps low, the gets on his knee and checks the sweep
lunges forward, turns it towards square leg with soft hands and sets off
flighted on middle and off, he gets on his knee and sweeps
full on middle and leg, he pushes it back to the bowler
gets forward and pushes it to the offside
stays at the crease and paddles it away behind square on the on side and that 50 has certainly perked up the crowd which had gone silent for a while, well played Shakib, he doesn't raise his bat
gets forward and chips it over the on side
strays wide of the offstump and he watchfully lets it go
the bowling change works, Chigumbura adjusts the line closer to the offstump, the ball kicks up a bit on Shakin who shapes to cut square but he only ends up getting a thick edge to Taibu
lands it outside off, he shoulders arms
Mortaza lunges across his stumps and pokes his bat out at a legcutter, not sure what he was doing
stays back to a back of a length ball and defends
flighted outside off and defended back to the bowler
gets this one to skid through and there's a sound as he shapes to cut, they appeal  but the ball clipped the pad
gets forward and pushes it through the line to long-off
gives it a lot of air, he gets well forward and defends
slower through the air, he gets behind the line and defends
steps forward to drive but he misses it completely
lands it on a good length outside off, he gets beside the line and taps it to the off side
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends to the on side
adjusts to a shorter length and he hops and fends it off
bowls the slower ball on the pads and he clips it behind square on the on side
slides down the legside, the ball clips off his pads and rolls away but Taibu does well to slide and cut it off
gets forward and pushes a full delivery to the offside
attempts a cheeky single towards short midwicket

it's that man Chigumbura again! He taps it towards square leg and sets off for a quick  single, Chigumbutra gathers and in one motion effects a direct hit and Mortaza is a yard short, excellent fielding, the third umpire takes a look
opens the face and steers it towards third man
defends very close to the pads and it prompts an appeal
opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
flighted outside off and he defends forward
waits for the turn, he stays at the crease and defends
gets forward and pushes it to short cover
stays at the crease and punches it back to the bowler
waits for the turn before defending back to the bowler
gets a good stride forward and pushes it wide of  cover
swings it on the pads, the ball clips his pads and rolls away to the off side as he tries to whip it away
slides down the legside, he misses a chance to nudge it down
gets forward and defends to the off side
lunges forward and scoops it past point
Dropped Mahbubul gives the charge and skies it over extra cover, Rainsford sprints forward from the deep, gets hold of it initially but lets it slip on the dive
shuffles and works it to short fine leg
tries to slog it away but the ball clips his pads and lobs towards the keeper
pushed towards mid-off
pushes it back to the bowler
gets behind the line and steers it to the off side
fullish in length outside off, he gets forward and taps it to the off side
strays on the pads and he works it to the on side
fails to control the movement and strays down the leg side
gets good reverse swing and and Islam does well to get some bat on it and dig it out to the on side
gets forward and chops it down to long-off
digs out another yorker

another direct hit! He nudges it softly towards short midwicket and attempts a risky run, Williams gathers the ball and under arms the ball directly at the non-striker's end, the third umpire takes a look
nudged off thee pads to the on side
steps down the track and Mahbubul wrecks Utseya;s figures by launching him over deep midwicket
drives firmly thrugh the offside but Price does well to slide and cut it off with his left hand
pushed back to the bowler
pushed back to the bowler
he bowls it really wide of the offstump and he chases it and mistimes the drive back to the bowler
gets a friendly full toss but he mistimes the loft towards mid-off
shuffles across his stumps and nudges it to midwicket
gets across his stumps and works it down to deep midwicket
makes room and tries to launch him out of the ground but he fails to make any contact
punches a full delivery back down the ground
flighted outside off, he gets forward and defends
takes a couple of paces down the track and defends
shuffles and nudges it down to short fine-leg
charge down the track and he gets a thick outside edge past short third man
he rocks back and slams a short delivery over square leg, Bangladesh are trying to get closer
full outside off and driven to short cover
drives in front of cover and sets off quickly, they scamper through for the run
ouch! Mahbubul fails to out away a full toss and it strikes him on the abdomen, he's on the turf in pain and they're reviving him
tries to heave it away and it's a slower ball, he works it to the on side
makes room to crash it straight but he misses it completely
comes over the wicket,  he stays at the crease and defends
and Zimbabwe win! Mahbubul tries to launch him downtown by stepping down the track, he fails to get the elevation to clear long-on and Matsikenyeri cups it just in front of the rope
